speechToText.title: Speech to Text

labels.languageDescription: The language of the input audio. Supplying the input language in ISO-639-1 format will improve accuracy and latency.
labels.promptDescription: An optional text to guide the model's style or continue a previous audio segment. The prompt should match the audio language.
labels.temperatureDescription: The sampling temperature, between 0 and 1. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.
labels.baseUrlDescription: The base URL of the local AI server
labels.modelDescription: The STT model to load. Defaults to whisper-1 if left blank.
labels.profanityFilterDescription: How to handle profanity in the transcription
labels.audioChannelsDescription: Comma-separated list of audio channels to process (e.g., "0,1")

speechToText.failedToSave: Failed to save Speech To Text Configuration
